<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->


## SafientMain class

This class implements an interface for the safient protocol's contract interaction allowing users to create and interact with the safes and the claims

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class SafientMain 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(signer, chainId)](./contracts.safientmain._constructor_.md) |  | Arbitrator Constructor |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [createClaim](./contracts.safientmain.createclaim.md) |  | (safeId: string, evidenceURI: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;TransactionResponse&gt; | This function creates a claim on a safe |
|  [createSafe](./contracts.safientmain.createsafe.md) |  | (beneficiaryAddress: string, safeId: string, claimType: ClaimType, signalingPeriod: number, metaevidenceURI: string, value: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;TransactionResponse&gt; | This function creates a new safe by the safe creator |
|  [depositFunds](./contracts.safientmain.depositfunds.md) |  | (safeId: string, value: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;TransactionResponse&gt; | This function deposits funds into a safe |
|  [getClaimByClaimId](./contracts.safientmain.getclaimbyclaimid.md) |  | (claimId: number) =&gt; Promise&lt;Claim&gt; | This function returns a claim by it's id |
|  [getClaimStatus](./contracts.safientmain.getclaimstatus.md) |  | (safeId: string, claimId: number) =&gt; Promise&lt;number&gt; | This function returns the status (0 - Active, 1 - Passed, 2 - Failed or 3 - Refused To Arbitrate) of a claim by it's id |
|  [getContractBalance](./contracts.safientmain.getcontractbalance.md) |  | () =&gt; Promise&lt;number&gt; | This function returns the balance of the SafientMain contract |
|  [getSafeBySafeId](./contracts.safientmain.getsafebysafeid.md) |  | (safeId: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;Safe&gt; | This function returns a safe by it's id |
|  [getTotalNumberOfClaims](./contracts.safientmain.gettotalnumberofclaims.md) |  | () =&gt; Promise&lt;number&gt; | This function returns the total number of claims created on the SafientMain contract |
|  [getTotalNumberOfSafes](./contracts.safientmain.gettotalnumberofsafes.md) |  | () =&gt; Promise&lt;number&gt; | This function returns the total number of safes created on the SafientMain contract |
|  [guardianProof](./contracts.safientmain.guardianproof.md) |  | (message: string, signature: Bytes, guardianProof: RecoveryProof\[\], secrets: string\[\], safeId: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;boolean&gt; | This function submits the guardian proof |
|  [sendSignal](./contracts.safientmain.sendsignal.md) |  | (safeId: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;TransactionResponse&gt; | This function signals a safe in response to the claim made on that safe |
|  [submitEvidence](./contracts.safientmain.submitevidence.md) |  | (disputeId: number, evidenceURI: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;TransactionResponse&gt; | This function submits the evidence supporting a claim, only claim creator can execute this |
|  [syncSafe](./contracts.safientmain.syncsafe.md) |  | (creatorAddress: string, safeId: string, claimType: ClaimType, signalingPeriod: number, metaevidenceURI: string, value: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;TransactionResponse&gt; | This function creates a new safe by the safe beneficiary |
|  [withdrawFunds](./contracts.safientmain.withdrawfunds.md) |  | (safeId: string) =&gt; Promise&lt;TransactionResponse&gt; | This function withdraws funds from a safe, only safe's current owner can execute this |
